verses.verse: Whoever loves<WH157> discipline<WH4148> loves<WH157> knowledge,<WH1847> But he who hates<WH8130> reproof<WH9640> is stupid.<WH1198>
A good<WH2896> man<WH2896> will obtain<WH6329> favor<WH7522> from the Lord,<WH3068> But He will condemn<WH7561> a man<WH376> who devises<WH4209> evil.<WH4209>
A man<WH120> will not be established<WH3559> by wickedness,<WH7562> But the root<WH8328> of the righteous<WH6662> will not be moved.<WH4131>
An excellent<WH2428> wife<WH802> is the crown<WH5850> of her husband,<WH1167> But she who shames<WH954> [him] is as rottenness<WH7538> in his bones.<WH6106>
The thoughts<WH4284> of the righteous<WH6662> are just,<WH4941> [But] the counsels<WH8458> of the wicked<WH7563> are deceitful.<WH4820>
The words<WH1697> of the wicked<WH7563> lie<WH693> in wait<WH693> for blood,<WH1818> But the mouth<WH6310> of the upright<WH3477> will deliver<WH5337> them.
The wicked<WH7563> are overthrown<WH2015> and are no<WH369> more, But the house<WH1004> of the righteous<WH6662> will stand.<WH5975>
A man<WH376> will be praised<WH1984> according<WH6310> to his insight,<WH7922> But one of perverse<WH9389> mind<WH3820> will be despised.<WH937>
Better<WH2896> is he who is lightly<WH7034> esteemed<WH7034> and has a servant,<WH5650> Than<WH4480> he who honors<WH3513> himself and lacks<WH2638> bread.<WH3899>
A righteous<WH6662> man<WH6662> has<WH3045> regard<WH3045> for the life<WH5315> of his beast,<WH929> But the compassion<WH7356> of the wicked<WH7563> is cruel.<WH394>
He who tills<WH5647> his land<WH127> will have<WH7646> plenty<WH7646> of bread,<WH3899> But he who pursues<WH7291> vain<WH7386> [things] lacks<WH2638> sense.<WH3820>
The wicked<WH7563> desires<WH2530> the booty<WH9285> of evil<WH7451> men,<WH7451> But the root<WH8328> of the righteous<WH6662> yields<WH5414> [fruit.]
An evil<WH7451> man<WH7451> is ensnared<WH4170> by the transgression<WH6588> of his lips,<WH8193> But the righteous<WH6662> will escape<WH3318> from trouble.<WH6869>
A man<WH376> will be satisfied<WH7646> with good<WH9185> by the fruit<WH6529> of his words,<WH6310> And the deeds<WH1576> of a man's hands<WH3027> will return<WH7725> to him.
The way<WH1870> of a fool<WH191> is right<WH3477> in his own eyes,<WH5869> But a wise<WH2450> man<WH2450> is he who listens<WH8085> to counsel.<WH6098>
A fool's vexation<WH3708> is known<WH3045> at once,<WH3117> But a prudent<WH6175> man<WH6175> conceals<WH3680> dishonor.<WH7036>
He who speaks<WH6315> truth<WH530> tells<WH5046> what<WH6664> is right,<WH6664> But a false<WH8267> witness,<WH5707> deceit.<WH4820>
There<WH3426> is one who speaks<WH981> rashly<WH981> like the thrusts<WH4094> of a sword,<WH2719> But the tongue<WH3956> of the wise<WH2450> brings<WH4832> healing.<WH4832>
Truthful<WH571> lips<WH8193> will be established<WH3559> forever,<WH5703> But a lying<WH8267> tongue<WH3956> is only<WH5704> for a moment.<WH9541>
Deceit<WH4820> is in the heart<WH3820> of those who devise<WH9177> evil,<WH9563> But counselors<WH3289> of peace<WH7965> have joy.<WH8057>
No<WH3808> <WH3605> harm<WH205> befalls<WH579> the righteous,<WH6662> But the wicked<WH7563> are filled<WH4390> with trouble.<WH9563>
Lying<WH8267> lips<WH8193> are an abomination<WH8441> to the Lord,<WH3068> But those who deal<WH6213> faithfully<WH530> are His delight.<WH7522>
A prudent<WH6175> man<WH120> conceals<WH3680> knowledge,<WH1847> But the heart<WH3820> of fools<WH3684> proclaims<WH7121> folly.<WH200>
The hand<WH3027> of the diligent<WH9167> will rule,<WH4910> But the slack<WH9559> [hand] will be put to forced<WH4522> labor.<WH4522>
Anxiety<WH1674> in the heart<WH3820> of a man<WH376> weighs<WH7812> it down,<WH7812> But a good<WH2896> word<WH1697> makes<WH8055> it glad.<WH8055>
The righteous<WH6662> is a guide<WH8446> to his neighbor,<WH7453> But the way<WH1870> of the wicked<WH7563> leads<WH8582> them astray.<WH8582>
A slothful<WH9559> man<WH9559> does not roast<WH2760> his prey,<WH6718> But the precious<WH3368> possession<WH1952> of a man<WH120> [is] diligence.<WH9167>
In the way<WH734> of righteousness<WH6666> is life,<WH9132> And in [its] pathway<WH1870> <WH5410> there is no<WH408> death.<WH4194>
